summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of 'Her' romantic website. All major features working correctly including hero section, animations, admiration cards, memory gallery, quote carousel, compliment generator, and responsive design.
passed_tests: Hero section displays correctly with 'For Her' title and main message
Floating hearts animation works in hero section
Scroll indicator animation in hero section
Things I Admire section displays all 6 admiration cards with icons
Admiration cards have proper hover effects (scale up)
Favorite Memories section displays 4 polaroid-style images
Memory cards have rotation effect and straighten on hover
Quotes carousel displays quotes with navigation
Quote carousel prev/next buttons work correctly
Quote carousel dot indicators work
Compliment Generator button displays correctly
Compliment Generator shows random compliment on click
Confetti animation triggers when compliment button is clicked
Color scheme uses correct sage green (#8DA399) and dusty rose (#E6B8B8)
Typography uses correct fonts (Playfair Display, Manrope, Caveat)
Smooth scrolling between sections works
Footer displays correctly with 'Made with love' message
All animations (fade-in, scale, float) work properly
Responsive design works on mobile viewport (390x844)
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
